title: Imbue Intimate Wash for Women| Vegan Feminine Wash | Alcohol Free, Sulphate Free, Paraben Free, No Artificial Fragrance | 3.38 oz
features: Natural, Plant Based, Vegan Feminine Wash. Formulated with ingredients like Aloe Vera, Neem, Banyan Fig , Tea Tree oil with the added power of Panchvalkala. Panchvalkala is formulation prepared with the barks of five trees mentioned in Indian Traditional Science (Ayurveda) for its effectiveness in vaginal cleansing.
Maintains the natural PH balance of the skin and reducing susceptibility to vaginal infections.
Helps prevents itching , irritation , odour and dryness.
Feminine Wash that is Cruelty Free, Alcohol Free, Paraben Free, Sulphate Free, No Artificial Fragrance
Easy to use flip top bottle extremely handy while bathing or showering. Contains 3.38 oz.
